name: Quercetin
desc: Quercetin is a plant polyphenol from the flavonoid group, found in many fruits, vegetables, leaves, and grains. It can be used as an ingredient in supplements, beverages, or foods.

images.alt: Ball-and-stick model of the quercetin molecule

flavon-3-ol: 5,7,3′,4′-flavon-3-ol, Sophoretin, Meletin, Quercetine, Xanthaurine, Quercetol, Quercitin, Quertine, Flavin meletin
Solubility in water: Practically insoluble in water; soluble in aqueous alkaline solutions[1]
standard state:
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
